channel.description: Plan your SSO application Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 762 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: This article presents a full overview of all the steps needed to build a web app and configure a web app integrationÂ It is interspersed with notes on what to include or not for OIN submission.
